RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cream City Dash S. FERNDALE RACE 1 220 Y Dirt CR: 86. Stakes Purse 20000. FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD (QUARTER HORSES) . No nomination fee, $100 to start with $20,000 Guaranteed, of which 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 7% to fourth, 2% to fifth and to sixth, and 1% to seventh and eighth. Weight: Three-Year -Olds 123 lbs; Older, 126 lbs. Winners of a Stake Race in 2023 to carry an additional 2lbs. Preference by money earned in 2023. Closed Sunday, August 20 with 13 nominations. (No sex allowance).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APPROVAL GIVEN stumbled start, much best. DOLLYS TALENT responded, missed. CDS ITS ONLY MONEY gaining late. THREE TIMES A LADY outfinished. ONE CORONA FIRE no rally. CONQUEST CREEK no speed. ONE FAST GAME no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: One Fast Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Three Times a Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: One Corona Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Dollys Talent
ENTRY.COMMENT: responded, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Cds Its Only Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Approval Given
ENTRY.OWNER: Boardshorts Stables LLC and Guerrero Emilio
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Conquest Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 9500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250 (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HER PERFECT VISION broke clean and went right to the front, set all the pace to the stretch, edged clear to mid stretch and held under steady urging. HAY JUAN stalked the winner throughout, was outkicked into the stretch but kept on to be second best. MIGHTY MATT had no speed, trailed to the second turn, swung out to the three path then closed willingly towards the middle of the track. HAWK HILL was chasing to the second turn, raced two wide to the stretch then closed the gap without threatening.

ENTRY.NAME: Mighty Matt
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, swung 3wide 2d turn, willingly late

ENTRY.NAME: Hay Juan
ENTRY.OWNER: MJ Ranch Ochoa Juan and Orta J Roque
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, outkicked backstretch, kept on, saved 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Her Perfect Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke clean, pace rail, responded, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Hawk Hill
ENTRY.OWNER: Ochoa Juan and Silva Juan Antonio
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, off rail, lacked needed response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $3,200 (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races For $2,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELECTRIC ELIZABETA was hustled along early to contest the pace, responded determinedly once in the stretch and held driving. GREAT CURVES had no speed, bid three wide on the second turn and closed steadily for the place. PHANTOMS BOOK was on the pace outside the winner, continued to duel into the second turn then got outkicked to mid stretch and tired. COASTAL STARLITE chased the pacesetters for three furlongs, responded when roused and was gaining belatedly. JERSEY STAR broke a bit slow, had no speed then saved ground to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Coastal Starlite
ENTRY.OWNER: Martin Jill A McDonald Frank and McDonald Melanie
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, roused 2d turn, mild late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Electric Elizabeta
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, dueled, responded 2d turn, dug in determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke step slow, no speed, saved ground, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Phantoms Book
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested pace, off rail 2d turn, tired stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Great Curves
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, asked 3wide, steady bid 2d

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 7500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HUMBLEBUMBLEFUMBLE chased the leaders to the second turn, swung out three wide, rallied to the front in upper stretch and edged clear driving. ZHIVAGO contested the pace two wide to the stretch, could not stall the winner but held off the others. DANNY MICHAEL trailed to the second turn, saved ground to the stretch and closed willingly to the line. LUKE'S PLACE was outsprinted to the backstretch, came two wide to the stretch but could make an impact late. ANOTHER STRIKE had good speed, dueled inside the runnerup to the stretch then tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Another Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed, dueled inside, tired stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Zhivago
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested pace, 2wide, caught upper stretch, saved 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Luke's Place
ENTRY.COMMENT: outsprinted, off rail 2d turn, no threat late

ENTRY.NAME: Humblebumblefumble
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, asked 3/8s, swung 3wide, rallied to lead, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Danny Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, saved ground, willing bid stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races For $3,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MASHHAD FLATS was on the pace from the outset, responded after five furlongs, dug in stubbornly and held on late. PERSEVERANCE stalked the pacesetters, for a half mile, bid three then four wide to the stretch and closed determinedly but too late. FORT YORK dueled outside the winner to the far turn, came three wide to the stretch then stayed on to mid stretch before tiring. SYNC had no speed and was always well back. SWEET MEG also had no speed and was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Sync
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Mashhad Flats
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2wide, responded 5/8s, dug in stubbornly late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: George E. Bates Trustee & Dennis Crooks

ENTRY.NAME: Fort York
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested pace, 3wide far turn, stayed on, tired late

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Meg
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Perseverance
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, roused 3-4wide far turn, determined finish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FERNDALE RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRONZE WARRIOR set a pressured pace for five furlongs, kicked away into the stretch and held driving. SATANTA broke a step slow, tracked the winner from the rail to the far turn then was outrun to mid stretch and bested the others. WELLSWORT (IRE) pressed the pace two wide for five furlongs, was two wide to the stretch then was outrun to the wire. LOOKOUT POINT trailed for five furlongs, raced three wide to the stretch and was never a threat. ROSES R BLUE was allowed to settle for a half mile, tried to rally into the far turn but came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Lookout Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, 3wide far turn, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Bronze Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, saved ground, kicked clear, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Satanta
ENTRY.OWNER: MJ Ranch Alvarado Esmeralda Ramirez Luis and Ruiz Salvador
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke step slow, tracked pace, saved ground, no threat 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Wellswort (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, asked 2wide, outkicked, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Roses R Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, asked 5/8s, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: C. J. Hindley Humboldt County Marathon H. FERNDALE RACE 7 1 5/8M Dirt CR: 95. Stakes Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD. By subscription of $50 to accompany the nomination, $200 additional to enter. $500 to Supplement by noon, Wednesday, August 23, 2023. With $20,000 Guaranteed, of which 60% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6 % t o fourth and 2% to fifth. High Weights Preferred. Closed Sunday, August 20 with 15 nominations, plus 1 supplementary nomination.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LORD WIMBORNE (IRE) rated kindly for a mile, responded when put to a drive after a mile and a quarter, pushed away from the favorite and won going away. GROWTH ENGINE was squeezed between MUCHO MACHISMO and LORD WIMBORNE(IRE) shortly after the start and clipped MUCHO MACHISMO's heels, stumbled but recovered quickly, pushed to the front, set all the pace for a mile and a half then was collared by the winner while well clear of the rest. LOVE OF THE SPORT was settled for a mile, got outkicked down the backstretch the last time and did not threaten. MUCHO MACHISMO broke out and helped squeeze off the favorite, made a bid inside after a mile to briefly loom and threat but gave way after a mile and a quarter. CORAZON DE LUCIA had no speed and was never prominent. MIKE OPERATOR had early speed, was a factor for five furlongs then gave out and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Love of the Sport
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, off rail, outkicked, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Machismo
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, bid rail 1mile, briefly loomed, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Growth Engine
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed start, clipped heels, pace rail, clear, tiring, easy 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Wimborne (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated kindly, roused 1mile, rallied 2wide, pushed clear driving

ENTRY.NAME: Corazon de Lucia
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Mike Operator
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, stopped
